# CandidateHub - Project Guide

## Project Overview

JG Biometric is a modern web application for parsing biometric logs

## Design Philosophy

- **Modern but Professional**: Clean, contemporary UI that maintains a professional appearance
- **Developer Experience First**: Always prioritize DX with latest libraries and best practices
- **Consistent with Backend**: All implementations should align with the FastAPI backend structure

## Tech Stack

| Category | Technology | Version |
|----------|------------|---------|
| Framework | Next.js | 16.x (App Router) |
| Language | TypeScript | Latest |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS | v4 |
| UI Components | shadcn/ui | Latest |
| State Management | Zustand | Latest |
| Server State | @tanstack/react-query | Latest |
| Forms | React Hook Form + Zod | Latest |
| Icons | Lucide React | Latest |
| Notifications | Sonner | Latest |
